translation.en: ♪ You don't owe me ♪ ♪ One more minute of your wasted time ♪
[woman] Shall we begin?
My client recognizes the deep attachment that your client has to his Mercedes
translation.ko: 내 의뢰인은 당신 의뢰인이 메르세데스를 아끼는 걸 알며

translation.en: and will not contest it.
[man] Mighty gracious.
-She will retain the Buick Enclave. -We don't have a problem with that.
-Excellent. -[man chuckles]
[woman] Now moving on to the disposition of the family home--
[man] My client requests the family home be sold
and the proceeds divided equitably between parties.
While you're busy hangin' price tags, Bill Townsend,
translation.ko: 이리저리 재느라 눈이 멀었구나, 빌 타운센드

translation.en: keep in mind that you aren't worth the skin God spent to wrap your bones in.
translation.ko: 당신은 그 뼈다귀에 얹힌 거죽만큼도 못한 개차반이야

translation.en: You best pray he doesn't regret his investment in you
translation.ko: 뭐 저런 인간을 만들었나 신이 후회하지 않기나 빌어

translation.en: as much as I regret mine.
Helen?
Maddie?
-Helen, I'm sorry. -Oh, don't you dare apologize.
That was the most magnificent thing I've seen you do
translation.ko: 그렇게 멋있는 모습은 처음 보는 것 같은데?

translation.en: since you ate that lizard in kindergarten.
translation.ko: 유치원 시절에 도마뱀 먹은 거 다음으로

translation.en: I only bit its tail.
Maddie, this is hard.
-But you will persevere. -Yeah.
What, so Bill gets to buy mistress Noreen a new house?
translation.ko: 그 내연녀 노린한테 빌이 집까지 사준대?

translation.en: The kids and I just have to move and start over?
-No, you won't have to do that. -[sighs]
Helen, I swear sometimes I think it would be a blessing
translation.ko: 헬렌 가끔은 내 얘기를 아무도 모르는 데 가서 살면

translation.en: to live in a place that... nobody knew what happened.
translation.ko: 가끔은 내 얘기를 아무도 모르는 데 가서 살면 얼마나 좋을까 싶어

translation.en: But the kids would have to find a new school...
new friends and I'd be without you and Dana Sue and I just...
translation.ko: 친구도 새로 사귀어야겠지 나도 너랑 데이나 수를 못 볼 테고

translation.en: How in the devil did I get to this place?
Maddie, I got you.
But Tom came on strong because that's his job.
translation.ko: 톰이 강하게 나온 건 그게 그 사람 일이라서야

translation.en: I am gonna beat him down because that's my job.
translation.ko: 난 톰을 이길 거고 그게 내 일이니까

translation.en: I'm gonna get you everything you deserve and then some.
translation.ko: 네가 받아야 할 그 이상으로 얻어낼게

translation.en: I'm still researching the legal precedent
for getting Bill's head on a silver platter.
It wasn't his head that caused the problem.
That's my girl.
Thank you.
Oh, Lord.
-[boy 1] So I got cast as Puck. -[boy 2] Oh, congrats.
translation.ko: - 나 퍽 배역 따냈어 - 오, 축하

translation.en: -[girl] Maybe I should ask for autographs. -[boy 2 laughs]
-Well, he needs help spelling his name. -[girl laughs]
translation.ko: 쟤는 이름 철자도 내가 알려줘야 돼

translation.en: -Oops, you forgot you aren't funny. -Ah!
Seriously. First a baseball star and now a theater star.
translation.ko: 장난 아니네 하나는 잘나가는 야구 선수 다른 하나는 연극판 스타

translation.en: Am I even worthy to walk to school with the two of you?
translation.ko: 너희 둘이랑 다니기에는 내가 너무 모자란 기분이야

translation.en: I'm just playing Puck. It's not even the lead.
But it's the best part, and you're only a freshman.
translation.ko: 제일 좋은 역이잖아 게다가 넌 고작 1학년이고

translation.en: Yeah, A Midsummer Night's Nerd!
Can't all be jerks. I mean jocks.
translation.ko: 다 바보가 될 순 없지 아니, 운동부 말이야

translation.en: Oh, you think you're funny? Yeah?
-Hey! Hey! -There ya go!
[boy 2] I can get you and your mom house seats.
translation.ko: 너랑 네 엄마 표는 내가 구해줄게

translation.en: [girl] I don't know if my mom can come.
-[boys] The restaurant. -[girl] The restaurant.
[boy 2] Don't worry. You can sit with us.
[boy 1] So what does Puck even do?
He solves everything. -[boy 1] Oh. -[girl] Okay.
-Just like you, right? -[girl laughs]
-Exactly. -All right, I'll catch y'all.
translation.ko: - 너랑 똑같네 - 그러게 그래, 이따 봐

translation.en: So, Annie, you had Mrs. Kelsey last year, right?
translation.ko: 애니, 작년에 켈시 선생님 수업 들었지?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Any tips on conquering The Odyssey?
Actually read it. She'll know if you're faking.
-Okay. -I'll see you later.
Ah! You're early! Okay, you know what?
That is fine because I am ready to go.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그래도 괜찮아 준비 다 끝났거든

translation.en: All right, new cocktail.
I started with rye to wish you a smooth finish,
translation.ko: 순탄한 마무리를 기원하며 호밀 위스키를 베이스로 했지

translation.en: added some bitters 'cause you have every right to be.
translation.ko: 거기에 비터를 살짝 넣었어 속이 쓰라릴 게 당연하니까

translation.en: Then champagne because this is truly a celebration
translation.ko: 그리고 진정 축하할 일이니 샴페인을 추가했고

translation.en: and finished with crème de pêche.
Because your future is gonna be peachy.
Calling it Maddie's Moment.
There is nothing to celebrate.
Wait, what're you two up to?
Darlin', we are all about being here with you, for you.
No, no, no. No. There's something else. I can smell it.
translation.ko: 그게 다가 아니잖아 수상한 냄새가 나

translation.en: And you two should know better than anyone that I have lost my tolerance
translation.ko: 나 속임수에 진절머리 난 거 너희가 제일 잘 알면서 그래?

translation.en: -for people keeping secrets from me. -Okay, you know what?
translation.ko: 나 속임수에 진절머리 난 거 너희가 제일 잘 알면서 그래? 알았어

translation.en: Let's forget celebrating, all right?
Let's think of these more as a statement of intent. Okay?
translation.ko: 지금 이건 뭐랄까... 불타는 의지를 들이붓는 셈 치자

translation.en: Helen?
Press on. Okay?
Maddie, nobody's gonna make you drink, but at least sit down.
translation.ko: 매디, 억지로 마시라고 안 해 그냥 자리에나 앉아

translation.en: -Come on. Take a moment or two-- -No, no, no. I cannot.
translation.ko: - 잠깐 숨 돌리고... - 아니, 안 돼

translation.en: I cannot because if I relax, I'm gonna lose it.
translation.ko: 난 숨 못 돌려 긴장 풀면 난 질 거야

translation.en: I swear to God, some days I just...
I wake up, and I have nothing but hate
translation.ko: 어느 날 잠에서 깼는데 생각해 보니까 나한테 미움밖에 안 남았더라고

translation.en: for Bill and Noreen pumping through my veins.
translation.ko: 빌이랑 노린이 미워서 핏줄에 증오가 흐르는 기분이야

translation.en: I have to get a new job.
I have to get a new house.
I have to get a new everything, and I...
translation.ko: 하나부터 열까지 다 새로 시작해야 하는데...

translation.en: I feel like I can't even catch my breath.
-Precisely why you need new inspiration. -Dana Sue,
translation.ko: - 그러니까 새로운 자극이 필요해 - 데이나 수

translation.en: -now's not the time. It's not the time. -Why isn't--
translation.ko: 지금은 아니야 - 시기가 안 좋아 - 왜?

translation.en: -Tell me. Tell me right this minute. -Tell her.
Maddie...
you know how Ms. Frances for a while now has been talking about downsizing?
translation.ko: 프랜시스 아주머니가 집 줄이고 싶어 하시는 거 알지?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Well, I thought it was a lovely idea,
translation.ko: - 응 - 나도 괜찮은 생각 같아 보였는데

translation.en: but it also broke my heart a little to think of that house just sitting there all empty.
translation.ko: 그 큰 집이 텅 빈다는 것도 마음이 좀 아프더라고

translation.en: So, I, uh...
I bought that big, beautiful house of hers.
-[chuckles] -[stammers] You...
Did you-- Did you ask her family?
I do not give a flying fish what Ryan Wingate thinks about anything.
translation.ko: 라이언 윙게이트 생각에는 눈곱만큼도 관심 없어

translation.en: -Let me tell you why-- -[clears throat] All right. All right.
Get ready for the best part.
We three are gonna turn that big, old house
translation.ko: 우리 셋이 그 크고 낡은 집을

translation.en: into a fluffy, glorious, indulgent spa.
translation.ko: 포근하고 우아하면서 편안한 스파로 변신시킬 거야

translation.en: Helen'll handle legal,
I'll set up the cafe, and you'll be the manager.
translation.ko: 난 카페를 책임질게 넌 매니저가 돼줘

translation.en: How on God's green earth
did you two think for one second
that I would be able to start something new, something this huge, in the midst of all of this chaos?
translation.ko: 내 인생이 말도 못 하게 개판인데 그렇게 큰일을 어떻게 맡으라고?

translation.en: -[Helen] Maddie, it's a job. -[chuckles]
Thank you so much for understanding, friends.
This morning was a little tougher than she was prepared for.
translation.ko: 오전 일이 예상보다 잘 안 풀렸어

translation.en: She just needs a chance to regain her bearings, that's all.
Well, I can empathize.
I thought I would lose my mind after I threw Ronnie out.
translation.ko: 나도 로니 내쫓고 나서 분통 터져 돌아버릴 뻔했지

translation.en: But I at least let you two help me.
Is that how you remember it?
Clear as day.
Well, you go on and cling to that then, Dana Sue.
And let me try to figure out a way to talk Maddie down. [laughs]
[chuckles] Okay. All right, you think you can?
I am gonna sweep Maddie up so fast,
you better have a bottle of your finest whiskey standing by
translation.ko: 최고급 위스키 한 병이나 기념주로 준비하렴

translation.en: to mark the occasion, no offense to this lovely cocktail.
translation.ko: 최고급 위스키 한 병이나 기념주로 준비하렴 이 칵테일도 물론 맛있지만

translation.en: Is that Macallan 18 confidence I'm hearing?
That, my dear, is Macallan 25.
Ooh, bless your heart.
All right, go forth then and work your magic.
Son of a bitch.
Randy, we'll put you and your mom in the circus room
and Dr. Bill will be right in.
-What was that about? -Come on, Bill.
You gotta know there are a lot of people unhappy with your... situation.
translation.ko: 불편한 사람이 한둘이겠어? 네 상황 때문에

translation.en: Well, my personal situation is none of their business.
Well, it's half my business.
People are canceling their appointments to steer clear of you and Noreen.
translation.ko: 사람들이 너랑 노린을 피하려고 줄줄이 예약을 취소하잖아

translation.en: -And that's hurting our practice. -We're getting married.
translation.ko: - 병원 운영에 안 좋다고 - 우리 결혼할 거야

translation.en: Come on. Maddie and I were on the rocks, Howie.
translation.ko: 잘 생각해 봐 매디랑 난 이미 위태로웠어

translation.en: I'm doing right by Noreen.
That oughta mean something.
It means something, Bill. Just not sure what.
translation.ko: 의미야 있겠지 이해가 안 돼서 문제지만

translation.en: Aren't you ready to pack it in yet, man? I mean, you're older than I am.
translation.ko: 아직도 은퇴 생각이 없어? 나보다 나이도 지긋한 양반이

translation.en: I love what I do, Collins. I'm sorry you don't.
translation.ko: 난 내 일이 좋아, 콜린스 자넨 아니라니 유감이야

translation.en: [sighs] We will never get another offer this good!
Collins, if you want to sell your store, then sell it,
translation.ko: 콜린스, 자네 가게는 팔고 싶으면 팔아

translation.en: but Grace and I aren't ready to sell.
translation.ko: 하지만 그레이스와 난 마음의 준비가 안 됐어

translation.en: Pickle Jar wants the whole block.
You don't sell, and you ruin it for all of us.
translation.ko: 당신이 안 팔면 우리 다 미끄러지는 거라고

translation.en: Neville, Collins.
You two enjoying your meals this afternoon?
Oh, my meal was delightful as always, Dana Sue.
Well, good.
Wish I could say the same for my pig-headed companion.
translation.ko: 이 고집불통과의 대화는 도통 즐겁지 않았지만

translation.en: Since I have upset you so, Collins,
the least I can do is pay.
Damn straight.
Damn straight.
You two all right?
It's hard when business comes between friends.
translation.ko: 친구 사이에 일이 끼면 힘든 법이야

translation.en: [man] Mrs. Townsend.
Coach Maddox.
Do you have a moment?
Is there a problem?
I believe in Ty.
He's got an amazing arm and a great heart.
Oh, dear. That big a problem?
Ty and Jackson Lewis were at each other during practice.
translation.ko: 타이와 잭슨 루이스가 연습 중에 다퉜습니다

translation.en: I made 'em both run laps, and Ty will be along... momentarily.
translation.ko: 둘 다 운동장을 돌게 했는데 곧 타이가 나올 겁니다

translation.en: Merciful heaven, why is it always Jackson?
Those two have been grappling since the sandbox.
I thought I got a whiff of a longstanding rivalry.
Yeah, well, still, that is no excuse
for Ty having a part in disrupting your practice.
I'm sorry.
I-- I keep telling him that it's an honor to be coached by a professional player.
translation.ko: 프로 선수에게 배우는 걸 영광으로 알라고 늘 이야기해요

translation.en: [chuckles] Former professional player.
Well, still.
Well, thank you.
Uh, but I do wanna say that Ty has been a little... hair-trigger lately...
translation.ko: 그런데 요즘 들어 타이가 벌컥 성질을 좀 부리더라고요

translation.en: and I don't mean to overstep, but are there any issues I should know about?
translation.ko: 주제넘게 나서고 싶진 않지만 제가 알아야 할 일이 있나요?

translation.en: Yeah, he's... he's hit a bit of a rough patch.
Ah. Junior year's a beast.
It certainly is. And he's hard on himself, and...
I'm going to take him home now.
-As you should. -Thank you.
Anytime.
[Dana Sue] Explain this, please.
translation.ko: "분노한 천재 찾기 '서레너티에 잘 왔어'의 주인은?" 이게 뭔지 설명해 봐

translation.en: Simon Spry wrote that, not me.
translation.ko: 사이먼 스프라이가 썼지 제가 쓴 거 아니에요

translation.en: I am talking about the picture,
which was taken from the roof of this restaurant in the middle of the night
translation.ko: 이 식당 옥상에서 한밤중에 찍은 거잖아

translation.en: by a girl who could only have gotten up there
translation.ko: 사진을 찍은 여자애가 거기 올라갈 수 있었던 건

translation.en: if she took my keys without my permission.
translation.ko: 내 허락 없이 열쇠를 가져갔기 때문일 테고

translation.en: -I don't know. -Remember how I feel about lying?
translation.ko: 난 몰라요 나 거짓말 질색인 거 몰라?

translation.en: Okay, I took a risk, but art requires risk.
translation.ko: 모험해 봤어요 하지만 예술엔 모험이 필요해요

translation.en: I'm just as committed to my art as you are to yours.
translation.ko: 나도 엄마처럼 내 일에 최선을 다한다고요

translation.en: Okay.
And by "art,"
you mean this Instagram account called Welcome to Serenity?
Okay, your friend Simon says, "It presents a look at the real Serenity."
translation.ko: 그래, 네 친구 사이먼 말로는 진짜 서레너티의 모습을 거기서 볼 수 있대서

translation.en: So I thought I would take a look at my daughter's opinion of her hometown.
translation.ko: 내 딸이 고향에 대해 어떻게 생각하는지 살펴봤어

translation.en: And this Instagram account
is filled with pictures of possums
and broken windows and sick trees.
Is that truly how you see us?
translation.ko: 너 정말 우리 마을을 이렇게 보는 거야?

translation.en: Everyone in this town pretends to be so perfect,
translation.ko: 이 마을 사람들은 다 완벽한 척해요

translation.en: always sweet, smiling, serene,
translation.ko: 항상 다정하게 미소 지으며 만사 평온하다는 듯 굴죠

translation.en: and then when your life blows up,
you're supposed to just pretend like everything's still all good?
All fine, all bright and shiny and--
translation.ko: 다 멀쩡한 척 즐거운 척, 기쁜 척...

translation.en: Okay, so because of what happened with your dad,
you are gonna mock this whole town,
which is filled with good people
just doing their best to get through the day.
This isn't about Dad.
You know, why are we even having this conversation?
translation.ko: 애초에 이런 대화는 왜 하는 거예요?

translation.en: You don't get me. Or my art.
translation.ko: 엄마는 나도 내 예술도 이해 못 하는데

translation.en: I have something to say.
Well, you find another way to say it.
And don't you ever take my keys again.
Go.
Chef, thank you for joining us.
What do you need, Brad?
Let us discuss the dissolute life this catfish led.
translation.ko: 이 방종한 메기의 삶에 대해 토론 좀 하십시다

translation.en: Overlook his sins and fry him.
Folks are coming to eat him, not befriend him.
translation.ko: 손님들은 먹으러 오지 친구 사귀러 오지 않으니까

translation.en: I wanted to poach him.
Well, we all want things we can't have. All right, listen up, y'all.
translation.ko: 원래 하지 말라면 더 하고 싶죠 자, 다들 잘 들어요

translation.en: We have a problem.
Several bottles of very expensive liquor are missing.
translation.ko: 아주 값비싼 술이 몇 병 사라졌습니다

translation.en: [Brad] Disappointing.
These things don't happen in a well-run kitchen, people.
translation.ko: 잘 굴러가는 주방에서는 있을 수 없는 일이에요

translation.en: How are we gonna handle this?
If the bottles are returned by end of day tomorrow,
I absolve you. If they aren't, there will be hell to pay. That simple.
translation.ko: 분명히 말하는데 그렇지 않으면 응당한 대가를 치르게 될 겁니다 간단하죠

translation.en: Any questions?
-[employees] No, chef. -Thank you.
Back to work, everyone.
Erik's right. Let's get ready to make some hungry people happy.
translation.ko: 에릭 말이 맞아요 굶주린 자들에게 행복을 선사하자고요

translation.en: Hey, can you go upstairs and make sure Katie brushed her teeth?
-Mm-hmm. -Thank you.
Thanks for dinner, Mom.
Yeah, I'm glad you liked it. You were pretty quiet.
translation.ko: 잘 먹었다니 좋구나 오늘따라 말이 없네

translation.en: Can't get a word in once Katie gets going on Trollhunters.
I thought it was because you didn't want to tell me the details of your practice.
translation.ko: 연습 때 있었던 얘기 하기 싫어서 그런 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Told you on the way home. Practice was fine.
-Tyler. -Mother.
Coach Maddox told me there was a problem.
That's great.
Thought maybe you'd wanna fess up.
Tell me the details.
[scoffs] Okay. Okay, Jacks is a jerk.
Coach is a hardass, and I ran laps. Is that enough detail?
translation.ko: 잭스는 등신, 코치는 꼰대고 난 벌로 운동장 뛰었어요 이제 자세해요?

translation.en: -Watch your tone. -Can I watch it in my room?
translation.ko: 너 말조심해 - 조심은 방에 가서 하죠 - 타일러

translation.en: Tyler, I've had myself a day,
translation.ko: - 조심은 방에 가서 하죠 - 타일러 안 그래도 엄마 오늘 힘든데

translation.en: and the last thing I need is disrespect from you to ice the cake.
-Yeah, but-- -Go upstairs before you say something that I will make you regret.
translation.ko: 입 닫고 올라가 후회할 말 하기 전에

translation.en: God, I-- I thought you'd gone!
Inspiration struck.
I want to experiment.
Uh, not at this hour.
This is when I do my best cooking.
Well, that's supposed to be when you're on the clock.
-[Dana Sue chuckles] -Eh, you know,
you squelch my creativity because you're jealous.
translation.ko: 당신은 내 창의성을 무시해요 나에 대한 질투 때문에

translation.en: Have you been drinking?
I'm not on your stupid clock.
You're in my kitchen.
And there's no drinking in my kitchen. Ever.
What...
-Oh, you like my cologne? -Oh my God, that's whiskey!
translation.ko: - 내 향수 맘에 들어요? - 미쳤나 봐, 위스키잖아

translation.en: That is old, expensive whiskey!
You thief!
You know, everything that you have
is because of me.
Everything I have, I worked for.
translation.ko: 내가 가진 건 전부 내 노력 덕분이죠

translation.en: And sacrificed for
without talking down to my staff
or pretending that my talent excuses bad behavior.
You know the reason female chefs rarely succeed?
translation.ko: 여자 셰프가 왜 성공 못 하는지 알아요?

translation.en: You can't take criticism.
Goodbye, Brad.
[chortles] Oh, come on!
Ah, don't be a buzzkill.
We got this beautiful piece of meat to play with.
-We got all night. -You're fired.
[chortles] No, I'm not.
Well,
I don't think I could use any smaller words.
Go.
-No, come on. -Don't touch me!
Get out.
Get out.
Get your things and get out of here!
And leave your key.
Daddy! Daddy's here!
[woman] Hi, Katie.
[Katie] No, you're not Daddy.
-Noreen. -Bill got called into the office.
There's this nasty bug going around,
and we just got flooded with emergency walk-ins.
So I'm here to pick them up.
Okay, I'm not going.
Oh, no, your dad doesn't have to work the whole day.
translation.ko: 아니, 아빠가 종일 일만 하신다는 건 아니고

translation.en: He's just running late, and he didn't want y'all to have to wait.
translation.ko: 좀 늦어질 것 같은데 기다릴까 봐 날 보내신 거야

translation.en: It's your dad's day.
Yeah, well, I don't have the bug so I don't need to see him.
translation.ko: 난 바이러스 없으니까 볼 필요 없어요

translation.en: I'm staying with Ty.
I'm not gonna force my children to go with you.
Bill will be so disappointed.
Yeah, well, Bill should be here.
I'll go.
So, how's school?
Great.
I'm in the spring play. I'm Puck in Midsummer Night's Dream.
translation.ko: 봄 연극 준비 중이에요 '한여름 밤의 꿈'에서 퍽 역할 해요

translation.en: I don't know that one.
Shakespeare?
I've only seen one play.
It was beautiful.
It was called Cats.
Yeah, but that's a musical.
It's not real theater.
But your play is?
Doesn't get much more classic.
Tell me more.
[Helen] Hey, girl.
Hey, morning.
You know, Erik's at the Farmer's Market hunting strawberries for shortcake
translation.ko: 에릭은 시장에 쇼트케이크용 딸기 사러 갔어

translation.en: and you are way too early for croissants.
I'm on my way to the office for a little quiet work time,
translation.ko: 조용히 일이나 하려고 사무실에 들어가는 길에

translation.en: and I thought I'd pop in and say good morning.
Well, good morning.
You alone?
Yeah, had to get a jump on things.
Short-handed.
I fired Brad.
I see.
He was drinking.
-You have a rule. -And he stole from me.
translation.ko: - 규칙은 지켜야지 - 내 술을 훔쳐 마셨어

translation.en: Oh, he broke the law.
And he lied to me.
And I will not have a man who lies in this kitchen or in my life.
translation.ko: 이 주방에든 내 인생에든 거짓말 치는 놈은 못 둬

translation.en: You'll find better.
-[sighs] -For both.
[chuckles] Thank you. Thank you.
I hope so.
Hello!
-Mama. -[chuckles]
[chuckling] How crappy is your day, dear?
Well, that's such a kind assumption.
If your day was fabulous,
your daughter would not have called me, begging me to rescue her.
translation.ko: 네 딸이 자기 좀 구해달라고 할미한테 전화하지 않았겠지

translation.en: Katydid! Nana's here!
You know she's not supposed to use the phone without permission.
translation.ko: 전화 쓰려면 허락받아야 하는 거 엄마도 아시잖아요

translation.en: Well, just be grateful that she called me instead of someone less fun.
translation.ko: 재미없는 사람 말고 나한테 전화했으니 고마워하렴

translation.en: Oh, you're-- Good girl! You're doing your resume!
But not very well. But you're doing it!
translation.ko: 뭐, 내용은 없지만 쓰는 게 중요한 거지

translation.en: Okay, well, don't help, Mama.
Mothers returning to the workforce
should be thinking in terms of relevant experience.
translation.ko: 관련 경험의 관점에서 생각해 봐야 해

translation.en: For instance, um,
organizing school field trips is material and manpower management.
translation.ko: 학교의 현장 학습 준비는 물자 및 인력 관리지

translation.en: When was the last time you did a resume?
translation.ko: 엄마는 마지막으로 이력서 쓴 게 언제예요?

translation.en: Never, I have a catalog. My paintings speak for me.
translation.ko: 쓴 적 없어, 도록이 있잖니 그림으로 말하는 사람이니까

translation.en: Well, then you should probably be the last person giving me advice on writing one.
translation.ko: 그럼 엄마는 내 이력서에 괜히 말 보태지 마세요

translation.en: Why does everyone think they can sit in judgment in my life?
translation.ko: 왜 다들 내 인생을 재단할 수 있다고 생각하는 거죠?

translation.en: People are trying to help you because they love you,
and they believe that you deserve better.
translation.ko: 넌 더 좋은 걸 누릴 자격이 있다고 생각하니까

translation.en: Me and my friends are ready to go, Nana!
Well, then let's go and have ourselves... [kisses] ...an adventure!
Oh, you know what you have to do before we go.
-Bye, Mommy. -Bye, baby.
Have fun.
How bad can the world be, really?
[Paula] So, are we gonna go get those black shoes today?
translation.ko: 좋아, 오늘은 그 검정 구두 사러 갈까?

translation.en: -[Katie] Yeah. -[Paula] You're very grown-up!
So you have heard of the Pickle Jar?
I haven't been inside one.
But the commercials make it look like an arcade
crossed with a barn wrapped up in a burger joint.
translation.ko: 햄버거 가게이긴 한데 오락실 같기도 헛간 같기도 하고

translation.en: -Yeah. -They're loud and messy,
and they don't have ice cream!
-[laughs] -[Neville] They wanna buy the whole block.
Us, the hardware store, and the dry cleaner.
The Gibsons don't wanna sell.
Collins, he'd sell the hardware store and leave town tomorrow.
translation.ko: 콜린스는 철물점 팔고 내일 동네를 떠난다고 하고

translation.en: What do you want to do?
Serenity does need the new business.
Just not this one.
It would be great to travel.
You'd be bored in a week.
Do I sense a lack of consensus?
Mr. Worry Wart here is suddenly thinking
translation.ko: 이 걱정꾸러기 아저씨가 갑자기 대의를 위해 가게를 파는 게 좋겠다잖아

translation.en: that maybe we should sell for the greater good.
translation.ko: 갑자기 대의를 위해 가게를 파는 게 좋겠다잖아

translation.en: Go along with Collins,
persuade the Gibsons,
and use the money to help Serenity in some new way.
translation.ko: 그 돈을 써서 서레너티를 새롭게 가꾸자고

translation.en: Which is why we wanted to see what you think of the offer.
translation.ko: 그래서 이 제안에 대한 자네 생각이 알고 싶어

translation.en: We do need to think of the greater good here.
You and I have always been committed to bringing business to Serenity, Helen.
translation.ko: 서레너티를 부흥시키려고 자네와 난 늘 노력하지 않았나

translation.en: Why else be on Town Council?
But as happy as Grace and I are here...
translation.ko: 그레이스와 난 여기서 장사하는 게 좋지만

translation.en: ...if you think this is a good offer and we--
They're lowballing you. Significantly. They won't come up in any meaningful way.
translation.ko: 금액이 터무니없이 낮아요 크게 올려줄 것 같지도 않고요

translation.en: Thank you, Jesus!
All right, sugar. We are not selling.
Helen says it's okay.
But what happens to Collins?
Well, we can work on finding him another option,
if he'll let us.
Helen Decatur, I'm making you a milkshake to celebrate.
Yes.
[Annie] I've got dessert!
-Yay! Chef Erik brownies! -[Annie chuckles]
Mom knows they're your favorite.
translation.ko: 네가 좋아하는 거 우리 엄마도 아시더라

translation.en: So, Margarita Night underway?
Yeah, uh, Aunt Helen came in with Mom and me.
translation.ko: 응, 엄마랑 오는 길에 헬렌 이모도 같이 왔어

translation.en: -They're in the living room. -As always.
Uh, no, thanks. I gotta bounce. I'm meeting Luke.
translation.ko: 난 됐어, 금방 가야 해 루크 만나기로 했거든

translation.en: Should I put it in the fridge?
I'll take that!
-Would you like to go-- -Trollhunters!
Captain, you have the comm.
Wow, great power and great responsibility.
translation.ko: 큰 힘에는 큰 책임이 따르는 법인데

translation.en: I believe in you.
All right, y'all. Don't have too much fun.
[all] Pour it out.
This touches my soul.
The companions or the margaritas?
Mmm. Yes.
I thank heavens for Margarita Nights.
I truly, truly believe
that there is not a problem in this world
that cannot be solved by having a drink and a talk
with the two of you.
It's been a week, hasn't it?
Oof. Yeah, my week had a week.
[Helen] Hey.
Right. I fired Brad.
So I have to find a new sous-chef and...
ugh, just regular kitchen turmoil.
Oh, and also my daughter hates me and hates Serenity
translation.ko: 참, 내 딸이 나랑 서레너티를 싫어해

translation.en: and can't wait to get away from both of us, so--
What happened with Annie?
She is going through that very special phase.
Serenity is small and slow and she must see the world.
translation.ko: 서레너티는 작고 느려 터져서 더 큰 세상을 보셔야겠대

translation.en: Oh, I remember that phase.
Yeah. You do, and you did it. You left. Cheers.
Yes, cheers. [chuckles]
All right, well, this is what Annie thinks of Serenity.
translation.ko: 잘 봐, 애니는 서레너티를 이렇게 생각해

translation.en: [Helen] Whatever happened to expressing yourself through bad haircuts and loud music?
translation.ko: 흉측한 머리랑 귀 따가운 음악으로 자기표현 하던 너랑은 다르네

translation.en: -[Dana Sue] Thank you. -[Maddie] These are good.
No.
-Not the possum. -[Helen] That's a possum!
-But the pictures. -[Helen] Uh-uh.
She should keep this up.
Well, this isn't really how I want her to see Serenity.
You can encourage her art while also continuing to change her point of view.
translation.ko: 자기 예술 추구하게 칭찬해 줘 그러다 보면 보는 눈도 바뀔 거야

translation.en: [Dana Sue] But the art, right?
[Maddie] I'm sorry, Dana Sue.
And I'm sorry about Brad.
Is that why you're carrying that weight of the world look on your face?
translation.ko: 그래서 세상 짐 다 짊어진 표정으로 있는 거야?

translation.en: You mean this?
It's all the rage this season, you know? [laughs]
And it goes perfectly
with my "Are you sure you want my opinion?" lipstick.
translation.ko: 진짜 잘 어울리지 않니? '내 의견 들어도 괜찮겠어?' 립스틱이랑

translation.en: Mmm. I highly recommend the "Don't make me smack you" nail polish.
translation.ko: '얻어터지기 싫으면 자제해' 매니큐어도 강력 추천하고 싶구나

translation.en: [Maddie] Favorite shade.
You know, all this beauty talk sure makes me wish
we were going somewhere soothing and relaxing,
translation.ko: 어딘가 편안하고 느긋한 곳에 가고 싶어져

translation.en: like a spa.
Mmm. Oh my, yes. I would do anything to go to one.
translation.ko: 너무 좋겠다 그런 데 가면 얼마나 좋을까

translation.en: -Me too. -Or better yet, to run one!
translation.ko: - 내 말이 - 더 좋은 건... 아예 하나 차리는 거야

translation.en: Stop.
I know you guys mean well, but my life is insane.
translation.ko: 좋은 뜻인 건 아는데 내 인생은 한참 어그러졌어

translation.en: I'm holding it together by duct tape and happy thoughts
and I'm near out of both.
Which makes this the perfect time to start something new.
translation.ko: 그러니까 새로운 도전에 딱 좋은 시기라는 거야

translation.en: I mean, I don't know if it's going to restock your duct tape, but...
translation.ko: 이런다고 네 테이프가 다시 채워질지는 모르겠지만

translation.en: -those happy thoughts will just-- -[Maddie] What about you?
translation.ko: - 긍정심은 분명... - 넌 할 수 있겠어?

translation.en: You're swamped at the restaurant. You think you can take this on too?
translation.ko: 식당 일로 정신없잖아 진짜 할 수는 있는 거야?

translation.en: You know me. The busier I am, the happier I am.
translation.ko: 나 몰라? 바쁠수록 신나게 사는 거

translation.en: Maddie, you are a terrific manager.
And you have a gift for marketing.
You remember what that boutique in Charleston looked like
translation.ko: 찰스턴에 있던 부티크 어떻게 변신시켰는지 기억 안 나?

translation.en: -before you started? -Barely.
translation.ko: 찰스턴에 있던 부티크 어떻게 변신시켰는지 기억 안 나? 잘 안 나

translation.en: That was before the kids.
That was how you put Bill through medical school.
translation.ko: 그 돈으로 네가 빌을 의대 공부 시켰지

translation.en: Another lifetime.
And another lifetime starts right now.
translation.ko: 그리고 또 다른 생애가 이제 시작해

translation.en: With you in the driver's seat, -pedal to the metal... -[Helen] Yes.
...not answering to a man.
♪ It's yo' money, yo' destiny ♪
Wait, so this is charity?
What?
Maddie, it's an investment.
Maddie, Maddie, we have been talking about this since we were Katie's age!
translation.ko: 우리가 케이티만 할 때부터 꿈꿨던 일이잖아

translation.en: Going into business together, remember?
The Sweet Magnolias making their mark on Serenity.
Our, our spa is the perfect way to do that.
translation.ko: 우리 스파는 그걸 이룰 수 있는 완벽한 아이템이야

translation.en: -Come on, Maddie. You gotta trust us. -[Maddie] Okay.
When have we ever led you astray?
translation.ko: 언제 나쁜 길로 꼬드긴 적 있어?

translation.en: Don't answer that.
[laughing] I'm not. I can't. I cannot answer that.
That's not the way to convince her! Don't lie to her!
translation.ko: 그걸로 설득이 되니? 거짓말을 하면 안 되지

translation.en: I take it back.
Then what is it that binds us together as a congregation?
translation.ko: 우리는 왜 정을 붙이고 같은 교회 식구이자 공동체로 사는 걸까요?

translation.en: As a community?
translation.ko: 같은 교회 식구이자 공동체로 사는 걸까요?

translation.en: Is it habit? Obligation?
Or is it a shared vision of the future
translation.ko: 아니면 미래를 보는 눈이 비슷하기 때문일까요?

translation.en: informed by the simple, eloquent commandment to love one another?
translation.ko: 서로를 사랑하라는 단순하지만 감동적인 계명에서 배웠듯이 말입니다

translation.en: If we can trust that sharing, that commitment,
translation.ko: 그러한 나눔과 노력을 믿을 수 있다면

translation.en: then we can go forward and do great things for each other
translation.ko: 우리는 앞으로 나아가 훌륭한 일을 해낼 수 있습니다 서로와 주님을 위해서요

translation.en: and for the Lord.
The kingdom doesn't have to advance with brass bands or bulldozers.
translation.ko: 주님의 왕국은 관악대나 불도저를 이끌고 요란 떨며 임하지 않습니다

translation.en: No, it can advance gently,
with love, with respect, and with grace.
-Amen? -[congregation] Amen.
And now it is my pleasure to invite Joyful Noise to come forward.
translation.ko: 이제 기쁜 마음으로 조이풀 노이즈를 모십니다

translation.en: ♪ I'm walking with Jesus ♪
♪ The way that he teaches... ♪
Glad you could come hear Katie sing, Bill.
translation.ko: 케이티 노래 들으러 와줘서 고마워요, 빌

translation.en: -She did a great job. -Oh, didn't she, though?
Welcome to Prince of Peace. I'm Pastor June Wilkes.
translation.ko: 프린스 오브 피스 교회에 잘 오셨습니다 전 목사 준 윌크스예요

translation.en: -Noreen Fitzgibbons. -Oh.
Bill's fiancée.
Your church is beautiful.
Thank you very much. Well, good to see you, Bill.
-Thank you. -See you next time?
You bet. Of course. Thank you, Pastor.
People are staring more than usual this week.
translation.ko: 이번 주에는 사람들이 더 많이 쳐다보네

translation.en: Is my dress hiked up in the back?
It isn't your dress.
It's your ex.
Everyone's just waiting for you to melt down
'cause Bill and the nurse are here.
Well, precisely why I won't.
translation.ko: 정확히는 내가 왜 멀쩡한가 싶은 거겠지

translation.en: Well, heck, if you're not gonna make a scene,
translation.ko: 뭐야, 난리 안 칠 거라는데 나 여기 왜 있니?

translation.en: then why am I standing here? I have gotta go to work.
translation.ko: 뭐야, 난리 안 칠 거라는데 나 여기 왜 있니? - 일하러 가야겠다 - 그래

translation.en: -Okay. -[laughing]
-All right, where did Annie get to? -Mmm.
She's had a visit.
I'll bring her back. We'll catch a movie or something.
translation.ko: 내가 데려갈게 같이 영화나 보지, 뭐

translation.en: Thank you. You are a very thoughtful godmother.
Yeah. You should see what I can do with a pumpkin and a couple of mice.
translation.ko: 내가 호박이랑 쥐 몇 마리로 마법 부리는 것도 봐야 하는데

translation.en: I'd like to see that.
It really is pretty.
I wish we could get married here.
We'll get married somewhere beautiful, all right?
translation.ko: 우리 결혼식은 아름다운 곳에서 치를 거야

translation.en: Just not here. It wouldn't be--
Appropriate. I know.
Hey, why don't you get yourself something to eat, okay?
I'm gonna go have a chat with Tyler right quick.
Lemonade?
I assume you're not drinking coffee these days.
Thank you so much, Peggy.
It must be hard, what you're going through.
Especially without your family.
You're in my prayers.
Well, you need a pitching coach.
-I mean, your fastball should be-- -I'm fine.
Look, Coach Maddox may have played for the Braves,
but he was a shortstop, not a pitcher.
And this is his first year coaching high school.
-You're a guinea pig. -I'm fine.
-Look, a fraternity brother of mine-- -Dad, I'm fine!
translation.ko: - 내 대학 모임 친구가... - 아빠, 괜찮다니까요!

translation.en: Okay, just back off!
Hey, you watch your tone, son.
I'm your father, and this is church.
Tyler.
It's the day of rest. Can we give it one, please?
Yeah, well, I'm trying to have a conversation with my son, okay?
What do you want from me?
Right here? Right now?
I want whatever... Everything that went wrong between us just to stay between us.
translation.ko: 난 어떻게든 우리 사이 일이 우리 사이에만 머무르면 좋겠어

translation.en: I miss the kids, Maddie.
I'm sure you do.
You just need to give them some time.
And it wouldn't hurt to show them a little understanding.
translation.ko: 당신이 좀 이해해 주면 어디가 덧나?

translation.en: Well, it wouldn't hurt if they showed me a little respect.
translation.ko: 아빠를 좀 존중해 주면 어디가 덧나나?

translation.en: My daddy taught me that respect is earned.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠가 말씀하셨지 존중은 얻어내는 거라고

translation.en: Maybe your daddy told you the same
while he was busy teaching you that you're always right.
translation.ko: 잘난 아들이 늘 옳다고 가르치면서 말이지

translation.en: Is that how you're talking about me with them?
translation.ko: 애들한테 그런 식으로 내 얘기 해?

translation.en: I try my best to not talk about you.
translation.ko: 당신 얘긴 안 하려고 최선을 다해

translation.en: -Hey, Noreen! -Hey!
Can you eat cookies?
With the baby and all?
I watch what I eat, but I love a good chocolate chip cookie.
translation.ko: 식이 조절 중인데 초콜릿 칩 쿠키는 좋아해

translation.en: -Here. -Oh, thanks.
I, um... I looked up that play you're in.
-Yeah? -You didn't tell me it was so sad.
It's not. It's a comedy.
But... everybody's with the wrong person.
Yeah, but they get it right in the end.
And I help.
I mean, I guess I kinda start the whole mess in the first place,
but then I go and, uh...
You should see it.
I'd like that.
Bill.
Oh, not now, Helen! All right?
Brace yourself.
I want to help you.
So Brad's not coming back?
Nope, Isaac, he is not.
translation.ko: 안 와, 아이작, 올 일 없어

translation.en: When's my interview?
I appreciate that. Truly I do,
but you're fresh outta culinary school.
translation.ko: 요리 학교 졸업한 지 얼마 안 됐잖아요

translation.en: You don't have the experience on the line to be second in command,
plus God gifted you to make desserts.
translation.ko: 그 신들린 솜씨로 우리 디저트 만들어줘야죠

translation.en: I can do both.
[Dana Sue chuckles] No.
No, you would wear yourself to a nub, and I couldn't bear the guilt.
translation.ko: 기진맥진해 나가떨어질 텐데 그런 힘든 일은 못 시켜요

translation.en: Appreciate you, but I will figure this out.
-Are you gonna dance with me forever? -Yep.
Do you wanna twirl me?
-[Katie] I'll get it! -Okay.
Daddy!
Hey there, kiddo.
-[Katie] Daddy's here! -I see that, sweetheart.
Daddy, Mommy's making chicken parm. You should stay.
translation.ko: 엄마가 치킨 파르메산 만들어요 같이 먹어요

translation.en: Well, that is sweet of you, ladybug!
But tonight, I can't.
Another day, though.
I promise.
Right now I just need to talk to your mom right quick,
translation.ko: 지금은 엄마랑 잠깐 얘기 좀 하고 싶은데

translation.en: so why don't you run on upstairs and play, okay?
translation.ko: 지금은 엄마랑 잠깐 얘기 좀 하고 싶은데 올라가서 놀고 있을래?

translation.en: All right.
I know, I should've called first.
-Is this about what happened after church? -Yeah.
It is, but not about our conversation.
translation.ko: 그렇긴 한데... 우리가 한 얘기 때문은 아니고

translation.en: After you left...
I talked to Helen.
Look, I want to do the right thing here, Maddie.
translation.ko: 난 옳은 일을 하고 싶어, 매디

translation.en: So...
you and the kids should keep the house.
And we'll make it work, okay?
I'm sure that parm's gonna be terrific.
Yeah.
Aunt Helen, why'd you come back?
San Francisco.
Why'd you come back here to Serenity?
Why?
I've just been thinking, you know, you got out.
translation.ko: 계속 생각해 봤는데 이모는 바깥세상을 봤잖아요

translation.en: You traveled, had adventures, you ran away with a boy--
translation.ko: 여행도 하고 모험도 하고 남자랑 도망도 가보고...

translation.en: I did not run away with Ryan Wingate. Who told you that?
translation.ko: 라이언 윙게이트랑 도망친 거 아냐 누가 그런 소릴 하디?

translation.en: We got back together in college,
and then we made a careful plan
to go to San Francisco after I finished law school.
There was no running away.
So what happened?
[sighs] The careful plan unraveled.
We broke up.
But you're brilliant and amazing. You could've gone anywhere.
translation.ko: 그래도 이모는 똑똑하고 멋지니까 어디든 갈 수 있었잖아요

translation.en: Why'd you come back here?
Well, my mother was sick,
and my father was already gone,
so I needed to be here with her.
And you stayed?
Hmm. Yeah.
Because in the darkest moments of my life, this town stood with me.
translation.ko: 내 인생 가장 어두운 순간에 이 마을은 내 편이 돼 줬으니까

translation.en: Through losing my father,
fighting with the mill, and my mother's illness.
translation.ko: 그 시련과 엄마의 병에 맞서 싸울 때

translation.en: People like Ms. Grace and Mr. Neville and Ms. Frances,
they-- they held me up.
But most of all, your mother and Maddie.
They loved me.
They saved me.
How could I leave them?
Come on.
We have laughed, we have cried,
we have eaten popcorn.
Meanwhile, y'all look like you've played eight quarters of football around here.
translation.ko: 너 몰골이 꼭 풋볼 몇 경기 뛴 사람 같아

translation.en: How's life sans Brad?
Hectic.
I should get ready for my shift.
-Thank you, Aunt Helen. -Anytime.
No offense, but you're not going to survive
translation.ko: 기분 나쁘게 듣지 마 근데 수셰프 없이 이렇게는 오래 못 가

translation.en: without a second in command.
translation.ko: 근데 수셰프 없이 이렇게는 오래 못 가

translation.en: I will find someone. Don't start worrying about me.
translation.ko: 적임자를 찾을 거야 내 걱정은 하지 마

translation.en: I will stop pushing,
but I will not stop worrying.
It is how I express my love.
Besides, how am I supposed to look June Wilkes in the eye on Sunday
translation.ko: 게다가 내가 일요일에 목사님 눈을 어떻게 보겠니?

translation.en: if I do not stand with a sister in need today?
translation.ko: 오늘 도움이 필요한 자매를 돕지 않는다면 말이야

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
Erik, what is that?
It's Brad's infamous pot pie.
No, it's not. The crust--
But the crust was made by a pastry chef so, of course, it's better.
translation.ko: 페이스트리 셰프가 만들었으니 훨씬 더 맛있을 겁니다

translation.en: Plus, I added a touch of sugar for sweetness
translation.ko: 설탕을 살짝 뿌려 달콤한 맛을 더했어요

translation.en: to contrast with the savoriness of the filling.
I changed up some of the spices in the gravy too.
That's the cardamom talking.
Mmm. What other talents are you hiding, Mr. Whitley?
What else would you like to see?
Wanna put this on the dinner menu Tuesday night?
It would be an honor, chef.
All right. I still want those brownies out.
-They're coming. They're coming. -All right. Get busy.
Get back inside!
[Neville] You want Pickle Jar to come in here and take over a business
-that's been here for over 80 years. -[Mary] Wait, hold on!
[Neville] Ah, Helen!
Mary Vaughn has invited us to a meeting.
Would you like to come along?
I'm sorry.
This meeting is just for the Whartons, the Gibsons, and Collins Littlefield.
translation.ko: 이 회의는 훠턴 부부와 깁슨 부부 콜린스 리틀필드 씨 대상이에요

translation.en: Ah. The Pickle Jar sales stakeholders!
And are you holding this meeting
translation.ko: 지금 이 회의는 무슨 역할로 연 걸까?

translation.en: in your role as our mayor's wife or in your role as the realtor
with the greatest financial interest in these sales going through?
translation.ko: 이 거래가 성사되면 얻게 되는 금전적 이익이 엄청나다지?

translation.en: As an interested citizen.
[Helen] Oh! Well, then, this should be a public meeting.
And, Peggy, I hope that for the benefit of an informed populace,
you will cover this public meeting
in your role as a deputy editor of our paper
and not in the role of Mary Vaughn's best friend.
I've put this town first my entire life, Helen.
translation.ko: 난 평생 이 마을을 최우선으로 생각했어

translation.en: Can you say the same?
Always a pleasure, Mr. Neville, Ms. Grace.
Bless your heart.
Breathe, Ty.
Good effort, Ty! Go get your gear. We're done for today.
translation.ko: 수고했다, 타이 장비 챙겨, 오늘은 여기까지

translation.en: Hey, don't go soft, Harlan.
You can't let him get away with throwing junk. The kid's got a gift.
translation.ko: 대충 던지는 걸 봐주면 안 돼 저 녀석 재능이 아깝잖아

translation.en: And the kid's world is blowing up.
We can cut him some slack and still get him into the Hall of Fame.
translation.ko: 지금은 살짝 놔줘도 명예의 전당에 보낼 수 있어

translation.en: -Hold on. What're you talking about? -Cal,
I know you're the new kid in town, but really? Ty's dad?
translation.ko: 이 동네 처음인 건 알지만 타이 아빠가 누군지 몰라?

translation.en: Is a doctor and a big donor, so?
So, Dr. Bill had an affair with his nurse.
translation.ko: 그 빌 선생님이 간호사랑 바람을 피웠어

translation.en: A girl closer to Ty's age than his own.
Knocked her up and left his family to...
do the right thing by the nurse.
Boy has every right to be off his game.
translation.ko: 저 녀석은 잠깐 공 놔도 돼

translation.en: How the heck did I miss that?
You need to do some more catching drills, Coach.
translation.ko: 잡기 훈련만 말고 듣기 훈련도 좀 하셔

translation.en: Yeah.
[Maddie] Hey.
How was practice?
Ty?
I suck, Mom.
I should just quit.
You're not gonna quit.
I know what people think every time I step on that mound, okay?
translation.ko: 마운드에 오를 때마다 다들 뭐라고 쑥덕댈지 안다고요

translation.en: Yeah, so do I.
That you're a fine young man, and you are a superb pitcher.
translation.ko: 훌륭한 젊은이가 공도 잘 던진다고 하겠지

translation.en: Yeah, I wish.
Ty...
you don't carry anyone's sins but your own.
translation.ko: 네 잘못 아닌 일로 위축되지 마

translation.en: Focus on the fact that you have a gift.
And you're gonna be thankful for that gift.
And you are gonna develop it
and you are gonna listen to the coaches that help you do just that.
translation.ko: 널 도우실 코치님 말씀도 잘 듣고

translation.en: Look, I know it's hard.
It's hard, and it's unfair, and it's lousy,
translation.ko: 괴롭고 억울하고 더러워서 못해 먹겠다 싶겠지

translation.en: and Lord knows I would change everything for you if I could.
translation.ko: 엄마는 할 수만 있다면 널 위해 뭐든 다 할 거야

translation.en: But we're gonna find our way forward.
Together.
Because I'm always here for you.
And I believe in you.
I love you.
Yes. Thank you.
-Good game! -Oh, yeah. As usual.
-What's that bring my debt to? -[laughs]
Five figures?
Or a recommendation of a good fertility specialist.
translation.ko: 좋은 난임 치료 전문가나 소개해 주든가

translation.en: -For you? You still have-- -No, please.
Don't say that I have time.
As a certain birthday looms,
it sounds a little pitying.
Okay, but asking as your old...
make that longtime friend, not your doctor,
translation.ko: 그냥 오랜 친구로서 물어볼게 의사 말고

translation.en: something happen?
You're sweet. No, no.
This isn't caused by an affair or the lack of one.
I'm just... examining my options.
I could recommend a friend from medical school.
She's in Charleston.
But she's a straight-talking woman. Strong opinions.
I don't know that you two would get along.
Mama?
Oh, my goodness! A surprise visit!
Ooh! And an unsolicited kiss. What happened?
translation.ko: 뽀뽀까지 다 해주고 무슨 일 있니?

translation.en: I made a mistake.
Well, you didn't make me a grandma before 40
translation.ko: 나 마흔 되기 전에 할머니 만들진 않았잖니

translation.en: and in this town, that's saying something.
So how bad could your mistake be?
Well, I had a moment today where I realized
that a child does not always understand
when their parent is trying to take care of them.
So I wanted to apologize to you
for snapping at you Saturday about...
well, everything.
You could've called.
Oh please, darlin'. I was raised better than that.
translation.ko: 엄마, 나 그렇게 도리 없는 딸은 아니에요

translation.en: Oh, sweet girl.
I am so sorry
that life is kicking you in the fanny so hard right now.
translation.ko: 지금 네 마음 힘든 거 엄마도 다 알아

translation.en: [sighs] What you need is a lavender bath and a glass of Merlot.
translation.ko: 라벤더 아로마로 목욕하면서 메를로 한잔하고 가렴

translation.en: Oh, as lovely as that sounds, I can't. I gotta get going.
translation.ko: 너무 좋을 것 같은데 이만 가야 돼요

translation.en: No, Maddie. If you don't start taking care of yourself,
translation.ko: 안 돼, 매디 지금 네 자신을 안 챙기면

translation.en: who's gonna take care of your children?
Your friends?
And all the people counting on you?
Mama, you sound like Helen and Dana Sue.
What're you going on about?
Oh, they... [chuckles]
They have this crazy idea about opening a spa
and having me run it, and I just...
They keep telling me how wonderful it'll be,
but honestly, it...
it sounds overwhelming. And terrifying.
I thought you were done with other people planning your life for you.
translation.ko: 이제 네 인생 계획은 네가 세우는 거 아니었니?

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Now, if you want to do it, do it.
Now if you think it's a crazy idea, tell them.
translation.ko: 정신 나간 소리 같으면 친구들한테 그렇게 말하고

translation.en: Those girls love you. They'll respect your decision.
translation.ko: 널 사랑하는 애들이니 네 결정도 존중할 거야

translation.en: You chart... your own path.
-All right? -Okay.
-Okay. -[laughs]
I love you so much. I love you too.
I am so happy that Maddie came around.
translation.ko: 매디 마음이 움직이는 것 같아서 기뻐

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but she's gonna say no.
She's overwhelmed, and I can't say that I blame her.
translation.ko: 너무 벅차하잖아 그 심정도 이해가 가고

translation.en: So why would she wanna meet us here?
This is where the dream started. What better place to say farewell?
translation.ko: 꿈이 시작된 곳이니 작별 인사에 딱이잖아
